ModMetaData.name: LMC068.回收服装
ModMetaData.author: Sneaks
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Recycle apparel, armor, and weapons back to 25% of original raw materials. 回收服装、盔甲和武器，返还原材料的25%。 Original by Jem, updated for 1.0 by Sneaks for workshop uploading! Forum post: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18799.0
